title: Optimal AI Meal Planning Demo
content: I was tracking my meals the hard way for YEARS until I found Optimal AI... my mind is blown! showing how Optimal AI helps with meal planning
caption: I was tracking my meals the hard way for YEARS until I found Optimal AI... my mind is blown! #OptimalAI #CalorieTracking #fitness_enthusiasts

scenes.text: I was tracking my meals the hard way for YEARS until I found Optimal AI... my mind is blown!
Optimal AI makes meal planning super easy! 📱
The accuracy of {app_name} is UNREAL - it knows exactly what I'm eating!
I had to share {app_name} because it's too good to keep secret!
